content:
Sub05 stands on the street corner, feeling exposed and vulnerable in her skimpy outfit. She is not wearing any underwear, as per Dom's instructions, and she can feel the cool breeze against her bare skin. She is embarrassed and ashamed, but she knows she must play along with Dom's twisted game in order to avoid punishment.

As she stands on the street corner, a passerby catches her eye. He is a tall, muscular man with dark hair and piercing blue eyes. He gives her a sly smile and saunters over to her, his eyes roving over her body hungrily.

"Well, well, well, what do we have here?" he says, leering at her. "You look like you're lost, sweetheart. Need some help finding your way?"

Sub05 feels a surge of fear and disgust, but she knows she must play along in order to keep Dom happy. She forces a smile onto her face and lowers her eyes demurely.

"I'm not lost, sir," she says, her voice trembling. "I'm just...waiting for someone. A friend. He's a policeman."

The man's smile widens, and he leans in closer to her. "A policeman, huh? Well, I'm sure he'll be very pleased to see you looking like this. I know I am."

Sub05 can feel his hot breath on her face, and she fights the urge to push him away. She knows she must continue to play along in order to keep Dom happy, no matter how humiliated and degraded she feels.
